ProjectDetail: Built a Zoom-like conferencing platform with authentication via Clerk.io and real-time communication using GetStream.io.
Created an AI-powered image editor using DALLÂ·E 2 for generation and Cloudinary for uploads, enabling seamless enhancements and storage.
Developed an AI assistant browser extension designed to enhance search efficiency and provide assistance on LeetCode challenges.
Created an AI-based custom music generator using Streamlit.
Developed an AI-based movie recommendation system using Streamlit and the TMDB database, featuring over 5,000 movies.
Built an AI-powered body and eye movement detector for applications such as sign language recognition.
Developed a tool to improve the resolution of old, grainy images and enhance their quality.
Created a utility to convert JSON files to YAML format.
